scripts.say: Everyone together now, let's make some noise! I'll nep up your face~♪
I'll nep up your face~♪
I'll nep up your face~♪
I'll nep up your face~♪
No, no! You gotta hold the torpedoes like glow sticks then swing them like you're hitting an invisible anvil above you while you show me your dance moves! Yeah, that's it! That's the way!
Hold on, Neptune! What in the world are you teaching these poor little kids?! It's really worrying to see them do stuff like this!

Relax, they're just replicas! I'm working on the lyrics and choreography for this new song I've named "Nep-Nep Style"! All we need is small breakout performance and these destroyers are gonna smash everything else on the charts!
That's not what I was talking about... Ah, screw it.
Is she ignoring the fact there are carriers and light cruisers here too...?
It has the kind of rhythm that seems like it'll be popular even among battleships and heavy cruisers before long.
Dear god... You don't have a clue what this world is like, yet you go around acting all nonchalant like you already know everything, Neptune.
Hmm... I guess it's true I've got no clue about this place, but come on, it's fine! It's not like anyone's getting hurt! Besides, you know what they say: a rising tide lifts all boats.
That optimism of yours is truly enviable. But I suppose Histoire did tell us to investigate this world, so we should hurry up and find out more.

Uggghh, you're always so serious, Noire. We can leave that to our future selves to handle. Let's just have fun with everyone instead! Okay, guys, what should we do next? Since everyone's here, how about kick the can or tag?
Let's go with kick the can. We can use this in place of a can!
You can't kick a torpedo around! Don't you understand that's dangerous?!
It's fine, we've removed the fuse from it...
I-I don't think that's the problem here...
Fiiiine, let's do tag then! I'll be it for the first round!
I see! You're so considerate, Nep-Nep! Okay everyone, let's ctrl+esc out of here, before she tags us!
...I will follow you. "Of the thirty-six stratagems, fleeing is best," as they say...
Yeehaw! I'm gonna hide somewhere exciting!
Commence Operation Retreat! Run away and hide!
Sigh... They've already turned into mini-Neptunes. Some other girls are getting into it as well... I don't think I can keep up with these guys anymore.
That said... Everyone's enjoying themselves and having fun.
I don't believe that there's anything wrong with this either.
...Well, I guess. To be honest, I don't hate it either.
Oh yeah, Vert and Blanc... Uh, those 2 that arrived here after we did, where are they? They should've received temporary housing and permission to stay here as well...
Ah, Vert and Blanc? If you're wondering what they're up to, then...
Oh dear... Have I died and gone to CPU heaven?
Veeeeert, could I have more candy?
It's unfair if she gets all of it... I want some too, please...
Me, me! Me too! I want even more candy than they do!
Don't worry, there's enough to go around for everyone~! I've got candy, marshmallows, chocolate... I don't have any lollipops, but I have everything else you could imagine, and lots of it~!
Yaaaay! You have so much candy I've never tasted before!
I like this chocolate...
Mmmm, these marshmallows are so fluffy!
Hahah... I never would've thought this box of candy I happened to bring with me would come in handy... You never know what's going to happen. Okay, children, come sit on Vert's lap~!
Grrrrr... How DARE you lure these cute little kids in with candy... I've never been so angry yet so jealous at the same time!
...Next time, I'll just copy your strategy!
...Something like that. I saw her playing games with some of the children.
Didn't you mention someone that should set off stranger danger alarms for anyone?
If you're talking about Ark Royal then that's just her modus operandi...
Huh, I see... So what about Blanc?
Blanc expressed an interest in this world's books, so I told her where our library is located. I'll go take a look at how she's doing later.
Everyone's enjoying their time in this world in their own way, I guess... Perhaps I should let myself have a look around the academy as well.
If so, I could be your guide, if you'd like.
Yes please, Ayanami. Well then, after you.
